41  public class CacheTest {
42  
43  	private ThreadPoolExecutor executor;
44  
45  	private MemCacheDaemon<LocalCacheElement> memcached;
46  
47  	private CacheManager ehCacheManager;
48  
49  	@BeforeMethod
50  	public void beforeMethod() throws Exception {
51  		this.executor = (ThreadPoolExecutor) new ExecutorServiceBuilder().setCorePoolSize(0).setMaximumPoolSize(1)
52  				.setMaximumQueueSize(0).build();
53  	}
54  
55  	@AfterMethod
56  	public void afterMathod() throws Exception {
57  		this.executor.shutdown();
58  	}
59  
60  	@AfterClass
61  	public void shutdown() throws Exception {
62  
63  		if (memcached != null && memcached.isRunning()) {
64  			memcached.stop();
65  		}
66  
67  		if (ehCacheManager != null) {
68  			ehCacheManager.shutdown();
69  		}
70  	}

72  	@Test
73  	public void testSimpleCache() throws Exception {
74  		CacheBase<String> cache = new HeapMapCache<String>();
75  		doCacheTest(cache);
76  	}
77  
78  	@Test
79  	public void testEhCache() throws Exception {
80  		CacheBase<String> cache;
81  		cache = buildEhCache();
82  		//cache = buildMemcache();
83  		doCacheTest(cache);
84  	}

86  	@Test
87  	public void testMemcached() throws Exception {
88  		CacheBase<String> cache;
89  		cache = buildMemcache();
90  		doCacheTest(cache);
91  	}
92  
93  	/**
94  	 * Basic caching operations we expect to work with any cache implementation
95  	 */
96  	private void doCacheTest(CacheBase<String> cache) throws InterruptedException, IOException {
97  
98  		String cacheKey = String.valueOf(System.currentTimeMillis());
99  		//hard ttl is 2 seconds
100 		CacheEntry<String> centry = new CacheEntry<String>("CachedValue", 2, 1);
101 		Boolean added = cache.set(cacheKey, new CacheEntry<String>("CachedValue", 2, 1));
102 		assertThat(added).isTrue();
103 
104 		CacheEntry<String> entry = cache.get(cacheKey);
105 		assertThat(entry.getValue()).isEqualTo(centry.getValue());
106 		assertThat(entry.isSoftExpired()).isFalse();
107 		assertThat(entry.isHardExpired()).isFalse();
108 
109 		Thread.sleep(1010); //after soft ttl
110 
111 		entry = cache.get(cacheKey);
112 		assertThat(entry.getValue()).isEqualTo(centry.getValue());
113 		assertThat(entry.isSoftExpired()).isTrue();
114 		assertThat(entry.isHardExpired()).isFalse();
115 
116 		Thread.sleep(2010); //after hard ttl + 1 second (memcached has this whole second precision)
117 
118 		entry = cache.get(cacheKey);
119 		assertThat(entry).isNull();
120 
121 		//add & remove & get
122 		added = cache.set(cacheKey, new CacheEntry<String>("CachedValue", 2, 1));
123 		assertThat(added).isTrue();
124 
125 		Boolean removed = cache.remove(cacheKey);
126 		assertThat(removed).isTrue();
127 
128 		entry = cache.get(cacheKey);
129 		assertThat(entry).isNull();
130 
131 		cache.close();
132 	}
133 
134 	@Test
135 	public void testBlockingMode() throws Exception {
136 		SpyMemcache<String> cache = buildMemcache();
137 		//no need for executor in blocking mode
138 
139 		TestLoader fetch = new TestLoader();
140 		CacheRequest<String> req = new CacheRequest<String>("Block", fetch, 2, 1, TimeUnit.SECONDS, RefreshMode.BLOCK);
141 
142 		int rCounter = 0;
143 		fetch.setThrowException(true); // break it from the start
144 		try {
145 			cache.get(req);
146 			Assert.fail("CacheLoaderException must be thrown by previous statement");
147 		} catch (CacheLoaderException clx) {
148 			//we want this
149 			assertThat(clx.getCause()).isInstanceOf(IllegalStateException.class);
150 		}
151 		assertThat(fetch.getRequestCount()).isEqualTo(++rCounter);
152 
153 		fetch.setThrowException(false); //let updater fetch entry into cache
154 		CacheEntry<String> entry1 = cache.get(req);
155 		assertThat(entry1.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
156 		assertThat(entry1.isSoftExpired() == false);
157 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
158 
159 		Thread.sleep(500);//entry still fresh
160 		fetch.setThrowException(true); //broke updater again
161 		CacheEntry<String> entry2 = cache.get(req);
162 		assertThat(entry2.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry1.getValue()); //get from cache
163 		assertThat(entry2.isSoftExpired() == false);
164 		assertThat(entry2.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
165 		assertThat(rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
166 
167 		Thread.sleep(1000); //entry soft expired
168 		try {
169 			cache.get(req);
170 			Assert.fail("CacheLoaderException must be thrown by previous statement");
171 		} catch (CacheLoaderException clx) {
172 			//we want this
173 			assertThat(clx.getCause()).isInstanceOf(IllegalStateException.class);
174 		}
175 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
176 
177 		Thread.sleep(2000); //entry hard expired
178 		try {
179 			cache.get(req);
180 			Assert.fail("CacheLoaderException must be thrown by previous statement");
181 		} catch (CacheLoaderException clx) {
182 			//we want this
183 			assertThat(clx.getCause()).isInstanceOf(IllegalStateException.class);
184 		}
185 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
186 
187 		fetch.setThrowException(false); //ok be nice again
188 
189 		CacheEntry<String> entry5 = cache.get(req);
190 		assertThat(entry5.getValue()).isNotNull();
191 		assertThat(entry5.isSoftExpired() == false);
192 		assertThat(entry5.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
193 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
194 
195 		Thread.sleep(500); //entry still fresh
196 		CacheEntry<String> entry6 = cache.get(req);
197 		assertThat(entry6.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry5.getValue()); //same value from cache
198 		assertThat(entry6.isSoftExpired());
199 		assertThat(entry6.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
200 		assertThat(rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
201 
202 		Thread.sleep(1000); //entry soft expired now
203 		CacheEntry<String> entry7 = cache.get(req);
204 		assertThat(entry7.getValue()).isNotEqualTo(entry6.getValue()); //new value is fetched
205 		assertThat(entry7.isSoftExpired() == false);
206 		assertThat(entry7.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
207 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
208 		cache.close();
209 	}
210 
211 	/**
212 	 * Return mode throws Exception only when cache miss and fetcher error
213 	 */
214 	@Test
215 	public void testReturnMode() throws Exception {
216 		SpyMemcache<String> cache = buildMemcache();
217 		cache.setExecutor(executor);
218 
219 		TestLoader fetch = new TestLoader();
220 		CacheRequest<String> req = new CacheRequest<String>("Return", fetch, 2, 1, TimeUnit.SECONDS, RefreshMode.RETURN);
221 
222 		int rCounter = 0;
223 		fetch.setThrowException(true); // break it from the start
224 		try {
225 			cache.get(req);
226 			Assert.fail("CacheLoaderException must be thrown by previous statement");
227 		} catch (CacheLoaderException clx) {
228 			//we want this
229 			assertThat(clx.getCause()).isInstanceOf(IllegalStateException.class);
230 		}
231 		assertThat(fetch.getRequestCount()).isEqualTo(++rCounter);
232 
233 		fetch.setThrowException(false); //let updater fetch entry into cache
234 		CacheEntry<String> entry1 = cache.get(req);
235 		assertThat(entry1.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
236 		assertThat(entry1.isSoftExpired() == false);
237 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
238 
239 		Thread.sleep(500);//entry still fresh
240 		fetch.setThrowException(true); //broke updater again
241 		CacheEntry<String> entry2 = cache.get(req);
242 		assertThat(entry2.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry1.getValue()); //get from cache
243 		assertThat(entry2.isSoftExpired() == false);
244 		assertThat(entry2.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
245 		assertThat(rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
246 
247 		Thread.sleep(1000); //entry soft expired
248 		CacheEntry<String> entry3 = cache.get(req);
249 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async fetch
250 		assertThat(entry3.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry1.getValue()); //get soft expired from cache and log error //XXX how to check error log?
251 		assertThat(entry3.isSoftExpired());
252 		assertThat(entry3.getValue()).isNotEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
253 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
254 
255 		Thread.sleep(2000); //entry hard expired
256 		try {
257 			cache.get(req);
258 			Assert.fail("CacheLoaderException must be thrown by previous statement");
259 		} catch (CacheLoaderException clx) {
260 			//we want this
261 			assertThat(clx.getCause()).isInstanceOf(IllegalStateException.class);
262 		}
263 		assertThat(fetch.getRequestCount()).isEqualTo(++rCounter);
264 
265 		fetch.setThrowException(false); //ok be nice again
266 
267 		CacheEntry<String> entry5 = cache.get(req);
268 		assertThat(entry5.getValue()).isNotNull();
269 		assertThat(entry5.isSoftExpired() == false);
270 		assertThat(entry5.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
271 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
272 
273 		Thread.sleep(500); //entry still fresh
274 		CacheEntry<String> entry6 = cache.get(req);
275 		assertThat(entry6.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry5.getValue()); //same value from cache
276 		assertThat(entry6.isSoftExpired() == false);
277 		assertThat(entry6.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
278 		assertThat(rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
279 
280 		Thread.sleep(1000); //entry soft expired now
281 		CacheEntry<String> entry7 = cache.get(req);
282 		assertThat(entry7.isSoftExpired());
283 		assertThat(entry7.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry5.getValue()); //same value from cache
284 		assertThat(entry7.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
285 
286 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async fetch
287 		assertThat(entry7.getValue()).isNotEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
288 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
289 		//entry is fresh again
290 		CacheEntry<String> entry8 = cache.get(req);
291 		assertThat(entry8.isSoftExpired() == false);
292 		assertThat(entry8.getValue()).isNotEqualTo(entry5.getValue()); //new value fetched
293 		assertThat(entry8.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
294 		assertThat(rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
295 		cache.close();
296 	}
297 
298 	/**
299 	 * Async never throws Exceptions but returns null
300 	 */
301 	@Test
302 	public void testAsyncRefresh() throws Exception {
303 		SpyMemcache<String> cache = buildMemcache();
304 		cache.setExecutor(executor);
305 
306 		TestLoader fetch = new TestLoader();
307 		CacheRequest<String> req = new CacheRequest<String>("Async", fetch, 2, 1, TimeUnit.SECONDS, RefreshMode.ASYNC);
308 
309 		int rCounter = 0;
310 		fetch.setThrowException(true); // break it from the start
311 
312 		assertThat(cache.get(req)).isNull(); //async is null returner
313 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async refresh
314 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
315 
316 		fetch.setThrowException(false); //let updater fetch entry into cache
317 
318 		assertThat(cache.get(req)).isNull(); //still null
319 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async refresh
320 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
321 		CacheEntry<String> entry1 = cache.get(req);
322 		assertThat(entry1.isSoftExpired() == false);
323 		assertThat(entry1.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
324 
325 		fetch.setThrowException(true); //broke updater again
326 
327 		Thread.sleep(500);//entry still fresh
328 		CacheEntry<String> entry2 = cache.get(req);
329 		assertThat(entry2.isSoftExpired() == false);
330 		assertThat(entry2.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry1.getValue()); //get from cache
331 		assertThat(entry2.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
332 		assertThat(rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
333 
334 		Thread.sleep(1000); //entry soft expired now
335 		CacheEntry<String> entry3 = cache.get(req);
336 		assertThat(entry3.isSoftExpired());//return soft expired - refresh is asynchronous
337 		assertThat(entry3.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry1.getValue());
338 
339 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async refresh
340 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
341 
342 		Thread.sleep(2000); //entry hard expired
343 
344 		assertThat(cache.get(req)).isNull(); //async is null returner
345 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async refresh
346 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
347 
348 		fetch.setThrowException(false); //be nice again
349 
350 		assertThat(cache.get(req)).isNull(); //async is null returner
351 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async refresh
352 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
353 
354 		CacheEntry<String> entry4 = cache.get(req);
355 		assertThat(entry4.isSoftExpired() == false);
356 		assertThat(entry4.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue()); // new value in cache
357 		assertThat(rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
358 
359 		Thread.sleep(1000); //entry soft expired now
360 		CacheEntry<String> entry5 = cache.get(req);
361 		assertThat(entry5.isSoftExpired());//return soft expired - refresh is asynchronous
362 		assertThat(entry5.getValue()).isEqualTo(entry4.getValue());
363 
364 		Thread.sleep(50); //complete async refresh
365 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
366 
367 		CacheEntry<String> entry6 = cache.get(req);//cache is refreshed
368 		assertThat(entry6.isSoftExpired() == false);
369 		assertThat(entry6.getValue()).isNotEqualTo(entry4.getValue());
370 		cache.close();
371 	}

373 	/**
374 	 * Dodgy test because scheduler thread is doin cache checks in another thread every second 
375 	 */
376 	@Test
377 	public void testScheduled() throws Exception {
378 		SpyMemcache<String> cache = buildMemcache();
379 		cache.setExecutor(executor);
380 
381 		TestLoader fetch = new TestLoader();
382 		CacheRequest<String> req = new CacheRequest<String>("Scheduled", fetch, 2, 1, TimeUnit.SECONDS,
383 				RefreshMode.SCHEDULED);
384 
385 		int rCounter = 0;
386 		fetch.setThrowException(true); // break it from the start
387 
388 		assertThat(cache.get(req)).isNull(); //null returner
389 		assertThat(cache.getScheduled().size()).isEqualTo(1);
390 
391 		Thread.sleep(50); //scheduled refresh done (fail)
392 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
393 		assertThat(cache.get(req)).isNull(); //null returner
394 
395 		Thread.sleep(1000);//scheduled refresh done (fail)
396 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
397 		assertThat(cache.get(req)).isNull(); //null returner
398 
399 		fetch.setThrowException(false); // be nice now
400 
401 		Thread.sleep(1000);//scheduled refresh done (pass)
402 		assertThat(++rCounter).isEqualTo(fetch.getRequestCount());
403 
404 		CacheEntry<String> entry1 = cache.get(req);//cache is refreshed
405 		assertThat(entry1.isSoftExpired() == false);
406 		assertThat(entry1.getValue()).isEqualTo(fetch.getLastValue());
407 
408 		assertThat(cache.getScheduled().size()).isEqualTo(1); //resubmitted but still only one
409 		cache.close();
410 	}

412 	/**
413 	 * 
414 	 
415 	@Test
416 	public void testLoaderContract() {
417 
418 		final Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(getClass());
419 
420 		BaseCacheLoader<String> loader = new BaseCacheLoader<String>() {
421 
422 			public String result;
423 
424 			@Override
425 			protected Logger getLogger() {
426 				return logger;
427 			}
428 
429 			@Override
430 			protected String doLoad(CacheRequest<String> request, CacheEntry<String> softExpired) throws Exception {
431 				return request.getUserKey();
432 			}
433 		};
434 		loader.l
435 	}
436 	*/
437 
438 	private SpyMemcache<String> buildMemcache() throws IOException {
439 		InetSocketAddress address = new InetSocketAddress(11311);
440 		if (memcached == null) {
441 			memcached = new MemCacheDaemon<LocalCacheElement>();
442 
443 			int maxItems = 5000;
444 			long maxBytes = 10 * 1024 * 1024;
445 			CacheStorage<Key, LocalCacheElement> storage = ConcurrentLinkedHashMap.create(
446 					ConcurrentLinkedHashMap.EvictionPolicy.FIFO, maxItems, maxBytes);
447 			memcached.setCache(new CacheImpl(storage));
448 			memcached.setBinary(false);
449 			memcached.setAddr(address);
450 			memcached.setIdleTime(1000);
451 			memcached.setVerbose(true);
452 			memcached.start();
453 		}
454 
455 		MemcachedClient client = new MemcachedClient(address);
456 		SpyMemcache<String> cache = new SpyMemcache<String>("CacheTest", client, 1, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
457 		return cache;
458 	}
459 
460 	private EHCache<String> buildEhCache() {
461 		if (ehCacheManager == null) {
462 			ehCacheManager = CacheManager.create();
463 			Cache ehCache = new Cache("EHCache", 5000, false, false, 0, 0);
464 			ehCacheManager.addCache(ehCache);
465 		}
466 		EHCache<String> cache = new EHCache<String>("EHCache", ehCacheManager.getCache("EHCache"));
467 		return cache;
468 	}
469 
470 	private static class TestLoader extends BaseCacheLoader<String> {
471 
472 		private Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(getClass());
473 
474 		private AtomicInteger rCounter = new AtomicInteger(0);
475 
476 		private String lastValue = null;
477 
478 		private boolean throwException = false;
479 
480 		public void setThrowException(boolean throwException) {
481 			this.throwException = throwException;
482 		}
483 
484 		@Override
485 		public String doLoad(CacheRequest<String> request, CacheEntry<String> softExpiredEntry) {
486 			rCounter.incrementAndGet();
487 			lastValue = new SimpleDateFormat("dd.MM.yyyy'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS").format(new Date());
488 			if (throwException) {
489 				throw new IllegalStateException("I'm baaad. I'm baaad.");
490 			}
491 			return lastValue;
492 		}
493 
494 		public String getLastValue() {
495 			return lastValue;
496 		}
497 
498 		public int getRequestCount() {
499 			return rCounter.get();
500 		}
501 
502 		@Override
503 		protected Logger getLogger() {
504 			return logger;
505 		}
506 
507 	};
508 }
